degree: BEng (Hons) in Electronic Engineering and Computer Science (1st Class)
details: Awarded: Best Student in Electronic Engineering and Computer Science 2003. Subjects and Skills Studied Included: Object Oriented Programming in Java, Software Design (OOA/D), Database Design, Implementation and Normalisation. 3rd Year Software Project: Order System for Retail Outlet.

institution: King’s Manor School and Sixth Form
details: ‘A’ Levels: Physics B, Mathematics C, Electronics D. 9 GCSEs at grade C or above, including Mathematics A* and Science AA.
